description: This file sets up the main application layout and integrates Remix routing with external style and font links. It defines the overall HTML structure and shared components for the frontend of a web application, possibly for a Tic Tac Toe game.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Defines external stylesheets and font preconnects for the application.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: Main application layout component rendering HTML boilerplate and including children components.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Root component that renders the outlet for nested routes.
